sense.gloss: Shonan train, medium-distance train on the eastern Tokaido Main Line (coloured green and orange)

sdata.j: ↑湘南↑↓しょうなん↓で↑何↑↓なに↓をしたか↑教↑↓おし↓えてください。
sdata.e: Tell me what you did in Shounan.

sdata.j: ↑湘南↑↓しょうなん↓の↑海水浴↑↓かいすいよく↓↑場↑↓じょう↓は↑日曜日↑↓にちようび↓にはとても↑混↑↓こ↓む。
sdata.e: The beaches in Shonan are very crowded on Sunday.

sdata.j: センターって「SLAM DUNK」の湘北で↑言↑↓い↓うと↑誰↑↓だれ↓？
sdata.e: When you mention that centre, who is "Slam Dunk" Shouhoku?

words.gloss: Shonan train, medium-distance train on the eastern Tokaido Main Line (coloured green and orange)
